{"id":832252109,"lang":"python","lang_name":"Python","time":"1 week, 6 days","timestamp":1666983600,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"399 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/832252109/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Increasing Decreasing String","memory":"13.6 MB","code":"class Solution(object):\n    def sortString(self, s):\n\n        newStr = \"\"\n        s = sorted(s)\n        while len(s):\n            point = \"A\"\n            i = 0\n            while i < len(s):\n                if s[i] > point:\n                    newStr += s[i]\n                    point = s[i]\n                    s = s[:i] + s[i+1:]\n                    continue\n                i += 1\n                \n            point = \"{\"\n            i = len(s) - 1\n            while i  >= 0:\n                if s[i]  < point:\n                    newStr += s[i]\n                    point = s[i]\n                    s = s[:i] + s[i+1:]\n                i -= 1\n        return newStr\n        ","compare_result":"","title_slug":"increasing-decreasing-string","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
